original_text: He took six hundred of the best chariots, along with all the other chariots of Egypt, with officers over all of them.
korean_text: 선발된 병거 육백 대와 애굽의 모든 병거를 동원하니 지휘관들이 다 거느렸더라

sentences.original_text: He took six hundred of the best chariots
along with all the other chariots of Egypt
with officers over all of them
